description.raw:
Initial support for nightly builds

debbuild-base is modified to support nightly mode (VERSION=nightly) which will imply:

* Use the nightly branches from {software}-release repos. In these branches changelogs are static templates with xxxxx to be changed by dynamically generated version and ddddd by generated dates.
* It will checkout the default branch of {software} instead of using a .tar.bz2 

A test was done using gazebo: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-fake-debbuild/3/console

Also release.py took a new --nightly parameter which will skip the tar.bz2 generation and adjust some parameters to nightly mode needed values.
